title: Clowning around 2
creator_credit: George Whaley, Julie Morton, Paul D. Barron and Barron Films
brief_description: Simon “Sim” Gunner continues his journey in order to fulfill his dream of becoming a circus clown. Sim’s first job is as a junior “Carpet clown” in Paris but soon he finds himself in the Cirque De La Luna in Montreal. Eventually his clowning adventures take him back home to Australia where his ambitions come true.
